Instru-a-1: Checkboxes with a label cause the section with same name (h2 or h3 header) to be revealed or hidden.
Instru-a-2: Screenreader users please turn on reading of Title attributes. A lot of information is still in the titles.
Instru-a-3: Screenreader users should check expand all to ensure all content is visible to the reader. It is the second checkbox on this page.
additional-modifier-or-macro-(eg [[1d6]]: 額外修正值或巨集(例如 [[1d6]][調查員]).
display-ranged-2: 顯示替代遠程攻擊類型
display-cmb-2: 顯示替代戰技攻擊類型
all-attacks-insert-macro-attack: 增加到攻擊檢定的巨集
all-attacks-insert-macro-melee: 增加到近戰攻擊檢定的巨集
all-attacks-insert-macro-melee-damage: 增加到近戰傷害的巨集
all-attacks-insert-macro-ranged: 增加到遠程攻擊檢定的巨集
all-attacks-insert-macro-ranged-damage: 增加到遠程傷害的巨集
alternate-favored-class: 替代性可選天賦職業獎勵
announce-01: Weapon notes and header images can now be set independently from within the attack Options. You may have to clear @{macro_options} (located within Options) if you receive a missing attribute error.
announce-02: If the sheet has been recalculated and you still have empty auto-calculated fields, you may have to toggle(change attribute value(s)) of sub-component attributes to help generate a value for the empty fields.
announce-03: For existing characters/NPC's, if you do not see Version > 0 listed (top-right corner of sheet), use the Refresh Button to force a refresh of all auto-calculated attributes. This should only need to be done once and could take up to 10s.
announce-04: For macro calls to button rolls in repeating rows, you must do the above ($) and you must add "_roll" to the end. For attacks, add "-roll".
announce-05: All ability macros that utilize repeating attributes must be edited to include "$". e.g. @{repeating_foo_X_...} should be renamed @{repeating_foo_$X_...} where "X" is the row of the repeating section.
announce-06: Buttons within repeating sections can now be dragged to the macro quick bar. To learn the id/name of a button, drag/drop it to the macro quick bar, use the button, click in chat and hit the UP arrow. Each repeating row now includes the row ID.
announce-07: Rolltemplate backgrounds can be assigned colors. Choose a color on the config tab in the RollTemplate section.
announce-08: The ☷ button on the right will split a repeating section into two columns. The ☰ will change it back to one column.
announce-09: New Psionic ability sections have been added based on Psionics Unlimited
announce-10: Buffs have been changed to repeating sections. Names of buff totals have not changed.
announce-11: Attack and damage effects on the Attacks tab have been migrated to the Buffs section.
announce-12: All spell IDs have changed. You must update your macros. After updating macros you must go to the config tab and delete spells with old IDs.
announce-13: New screenreader friendly rolltemplates have been added. Check the Use Simple Templates checkbox on the Config tab, Roll Template section, or add an attribute called toggle_accessible_flag and set it to {{accessible=true}}.
announce-15: Spell book and attack macros now available. Above the list of attacks and list of spells are buttons. Click these and the list of available spells or attacks shows up in the chat area. Click the spell or attack and it will perform the roll you chose. You can also drag these buttons to your macro bar or call them from macros.
announce-16: IF TABS ARE FROZEN click on EXPAND ALL checkbox to the right, then close and reopen character sheet. This will expand all areas as a workaruond until it is fixed. We are in communication with Roll 20 on the matter.
announce-17: IF TABS ARE FROZEN please help by opening the javacript console on your browser (press F12) and save the console. Paste the console, along with the name of your operating system and browser, to: https://app.roll20.net/forum/post/3586462/pf-tabbing-on-character-sheets-stops-working
announce-18: Attacks now have 'insert' macros that allow you to add a macro to the attack roll and damage roll. Each attack has 3 insert macros: one per attack, one per attack type (melee/ ranged / cmb) and one global.
announce-19: Also are new macros for extra damage. One per attack and one global each of: non critical (sneak attack, flame weapon, etc), and critical only (flaming burst weapon, bleeding critical, etc)
announce-20: Sheet has attempted to update your attack macros. If one does not work, and you have not customized it, simply delete the macro for that row and click in another field. This will reset the macro. Repeeat for iterative attacks if necessary.
announce-21: Spells now have a spontaneous / prepared switch in the 'Spells Per Day' section per class.
announce-22: Skill options added to Take 10 or Take 20 to skill rolls, and to add Investigator dice to rolls.
announce-23: IF YOU USED SKILL TAKE 10 or TAKE 20 or INVESTIGATOR DICE DROPDOWN You must reset it by changing the dropdown values and changing them back.
announce-24: Damage bonus fixed. Other fixes found at this link: http://tinyurl.com/PF-Thread
announce-25: Skillbook button available on the skills page. Displays skill choices in chat area. Drag it to macro bar like other buttons.
announce-26: GMs NOTE: NPC CHANGES COMING in v.70 of this sheet. Please do the following:
announce-27: Preview changes at the beta site (link in post at 'feedbank' link in footer at bottom of this sheet). View the changes and give us feedback
announce-28: IMPORT A MONSTER FROM YOUR CAMPAIGN to our beta campaign to observe changes. Beta link in first post at http://tinyurl.com/PF-Thread
announce-29: Drag a monster from the compendium and report any bugs at the feedback link below.
announce-30: GMs, make sure IS NPC is checked on all monster sheets before version 1.00
announce-31: Non english speakers, please assist with translating this sheet. Details at the 'help translate' link in the footer.
announce-32: NPC CHANGES COMING @{hp} will be used instead of @{npc-hp}.
announce-33: SPECIAL ABILITY LIST CHANGES: are coming, watch here for updates.
announce-34: More expand and collapsible areas added to Attack Grid, Class Grid, Spellcaster class fields to hide complexity not needed by simpler characters.
announce-35: Attack macrobook has base Melee, Ranged, and CMB buttons at top. Spellbook has Concentration and Casterlevel check buttons at top.
announce-36: Spellbook, Skill'book', attacks, ability checks added above top menu. All can be dragged to macro bar.
announce-37: INVENTORY PAGE CHANGING: Armor set on inventory page. One list for equipment instead of 2.
announce-39: Fixes for .71: Craft and other fill-in-the-name skills now update totals properly.
announce-41: LASTPASS USERS NOTE: LastPass is still interfering with some Roll20 sheets. If you are experiencing degraded performance try disabling LastPass.
announce-42: Fixes for .72: Buff check updates skills without hitting refresh. Damage mod applies correctly. Fixes to attack and damage not appearing in rolls. Recalc will finish. Requires Training no longer removes skill submenus from skill menu.
announce-43: Thank you for your survey feedback. New changes are coming to simply the sheet making it much easier to use.
announce-44: v .73 updates; total skill points now correct when multiclassed and Intelligence < 10
announce-45: v .74 updates: Favored class hit points now add corectly.
announce-47: GMs please IMPORT your NPCs and monsters to the beta campaign at https://app.roll20.net/join/801350/kEQ72w and report any issues you have on the forums at https://app.roll20.net/forum/post/4484041/pathfinder-feedback-needed
announce-46: New sheet version coming soon! Check out the changes at https://app.roll20.net/join/801350/kEQ72w
armor-notes-place: 在這輸入有關條件AC加值的註記
attacks-dmg-migrated-title: Repeating Attack damage multiplier migrated. Cannot remigrate.
attacks-migrated-title: Repeating Attack macros migrated. If an attack rolltemplate does not appear correct, delete the macro text and click into another field, the system will reset the macro text to defaults. Repeat for iterative attacks macros.
base-statistics-place: 如果該生物有增益與其他啟動的效果，會修改他的數據的話，他的基本數據應該在此簡短總結。
before-combat-place: 在這列出在戰鬥前使用的任何法術或能力，他的數據應該反映出這些。
buff-damage-title: 所有攻擊的傷害的加值
buff-melee-title: 所有近戰攻擊檢定的加值
buff-ranged-title: 所有遠程攻擊檢定的加值
buff-skill-checks-title: 所有技能與屬性檢定的加值
buffs-migrated-title: Buffs migrated to Buffs repeating section. Cannot be remigrated.
buffs-showsect-cmd: Click to expand buff edit area.
carried-currency-title: 角色攜帶在身上會影響負重的貨幣
cast-defensive-bonus: 防禦式施法時的專注加值
caster-level-calculation: 施法者等級 計算式
class skill-bonus|armor-check-penalty|si: 本職技能加值 / 防具檢定減值 / 體型修正 / 狀態減值
combat-effects-migrated-title: Attack and damage effects migrated to Buffs. Cannot be remigrated.
combat-maneuver-bonus-notes-place: 在這輸入有關條件CMB加值的註記
combat-maneuver-defense-notes-place: 在這輸入有關條件CMD加值的註記
combat-maneuver-notes-place: 在這輸入有關條件CMD加值的註記
condition-deafened-title: 先攻檢定-4，察覺對抗檢定-4，並在施放帶有語言成分的法術時有20％的失敗率
condition-deafened-spellonly: 在施放帶有語言成分的法術時有20％的失敗率
condition-energy-drained-title: 所有的屬性檢定、攻擊檢定、戰技檢定、CMD、豁免檢定與技能檢定時遭受可累積的-1減值。此外，生物的當前HP和總HP會因每個負向等級而減少5點。
condition-entangled-title: 攻擊檢定-2，敏捷受到-4減值
condition-fear-title: 戰慄/驚懼/恐慌: 攻擊檢定、豁免檢定、技能檢定與屬性檢定-2。
condition-flat-footed-title: 措手不及: 在AC與CMD上失去敏捷加值並無法進行藉機攻擊，除非他擁有戰鬥反射專長或直覺閃避職業能力。
condition-grappled-title: 所有攻擊檢定-2，敏捷受到-4減值
condition-sickened-title: 所有攻擊檢定、武器傷害檢定、豁免檢定、技能檢定與屬性檢定-2
conditions-showsect-cmd: Click to expand condition edit area.
config-header-image-info: Header圖示是在擲骰模版首行顯示的標誌圖案。在角色卡上所有的巨集都會包含{{header_image=image attriubute}}。每個擲骰模版都有特定的圖示屬性，在下列選項中列出。例如 法術擲骰模版會使用{{header_image=@{header_image-pf_spell}}}，攻擊圖示可以在每個武器的"選項"部分設定。把滑鼠游標在模版名稱上面停留，可以得知該圖示的屬性。你可以使用下列的網址(URL)欄來替換任何擲骰模版的圖式，或使用{{header_image=[name](url)}}字串。
config-roll-template-info1: 擲骰模版使用準備好的HTML,CSS與巨集文字的組合來形成巨集的輸出結果。在Pathfinder角色卡中的擲骰模版有下列: pf_spell, pf_attack, pf_defense, pf_generic, and pf_block
config-roll-template-info3: 在下面是每個擲骰模版與其定義性質(keys)。在巨集中keys只能被使用一次。沒有被定義的key仍然可以包含在巨集中，並會依據擲骰模版顯示在新的行中。例如 {{foo=foo}} Property values 可包含文字，attributes, in-line rolls, 圖片，超連結，其他之類的，或這些的組合。
config-roll-template-info4: 每個擲骰模版都有@{toggle_accessible_flag}，這決定下列的字串是否會顯示: {{accessible=true}}。如果accessible被設定，那麼替代的擲骰模版會被使用，此模版不會使用divs或tables，只會使用labels和spans，一些使用者會覺得比較容易使用。這同樣也可以藉由點擊"使用簡易模版"來全面設定。
config-roll-template-pf_attack:
攻擊擲骰模版 (pf_attack)
使用在攻擊上。2欄的格式，除了"description"描述部分。(note: @{macro_options} is used by the sheet to enable the toggling of notes related to attacks and contains the properties for @{melee_notes}, @{ranged_notes}, @{cmb_notes}, and @{attack_notes}.)
config-roll-template-pf_block:
文字擲骰模版 (pf_block)
使用在職業能力、專長、物品、種族特性、背景上。Key/Property的名稱不會顯示在此模版上。適合很長的文字敘述。
config-roll-template-pf_defense:
防禦擲骰模版 (pf_defense)
使用在豁免檢定上。(note: @{macro_options} is used by the sheet to enable the toggling of notes related to defense and contains the properties for @{dr_notes}, @{resistances_notes}, @{immunities_notes}, @{weaknesses_notes}, @{sr_notes}, @{armor_notes}, @{save_notes}, @{cmd_notes}, and @{defense-notes}.)
config-roll-template-pf_generic:
通用擲骰模版 (pf_generic)
使用在屬性檢定、先攻、法術失敗檢定、技能檢定、專注檢定與施法者等級檢定。2欄的格式，除了 righttext_X(1-10), lefttext_X(1-10), and the description keys.
config-roll-template-pf_spell:
法術擲骰模版 (pf_spell)
使用在所有法術基底的擲骰。主要格式為模擬典型的法術數據表。 (note: @{spell_options} is used by the sheet to enable the toggling of spell attributes and contains ALL pf_spell specific properties.)
config-update-spell-macros-info1: This is a mapping of old spell ids to new spell ids for use in upgrading macros.
config-update-spell-macros-info2:
Click Modify for each spell level and delete all the old spell lists to eliminate old redundant attributes and possibly speed up your sheet.
						Once you delete the below you will not be able to re-migrate the spells.
critical-title: 在所有的攻擊檢定、豁免檢定、技能檢定與屬性檢定上遭受-3減值，在AC與施法者等級上也是
current-hp-title: 玩家可在此調整剩餘的當前生命值
custom-crit-confirmation-bonus: 此攻擊的自定義重擊確認加值
damage-multiplier-title: 傷害屬性修正值的倍率:例如 0.5倍、1.5倍、2倍之類，留白即代表1倍
damage-resistance-title: 傷害減免(DR): 從傷害中無視的數值與可無視此能力的傷害類型(例如5/銀)
defense-notes-place: 在這輸入有關條件防禦加值的註記
disabled-title: HP低於此數字會會陷入昏迷
display-advanced-macros: 顯示進階攻擊巨集欄位
domain-etc-type-example: 領(子)域/學派/血統/庇護主
domains: 領域 / 子域 / 血統 / 庇護主 / 學派
during-combat-place: 在這列出所有的戰鬥戰術，包括法術、專長與魔法物品使用。
enable-skill-check-query-title: 技能檢定會包括擲骰、取10或取20的選項
encumbrance-above-title: 角色可以把重量不超過最大負重的東西舉過頭頂
encumbrance-drag-push-title: 角色在一般情況下可以推動或拖行5倍於最大負重的物品
encumbrance-heavy-title: 重載:高於中載時，角色陷入重載
encumbrance-light-title: 輕載:總負重低於此數字時，角色不受負重影響
encumbrance-medium-title: 中載:高於輕載時，角色陷入中載
encumbrance-off-ground-title: 角色可以把重量2倍於最大負重的物品抬離地面，但只能帶著它勉強移動。
encumbrance-size-multiplier-title: 體型增加的倍率，腳的數量的影響也已計入
encumbrance-str-bonus-title: 只增加負重的力量加值
equipped-title: Select which armor and shield are equipped.
error-delete-row: Error! You must delete this row before editing any items in this section.
error-msg1: Error! You must delete this row before editing any items in this section.
expand-cmd: 鎖定或解除鎖定所有列
extra-damage-section: 額外傷害 (不受重擊倍率影響)
footer-info: Created by Samuel Marino w/contributions by Vince, Chris Buchholz, Magik, James W. 繁中翻譯:白貓| 最後更新:
gear-not-used-place: 不在戰鬥中使用的裝備
grazed-title: 在所有的攻擊檢定、豁免檢定、技能檢定與屬性檢定上遭受-1減值，在AC與施法者等級上也是
hit-points-ability-title: 決定每等級生命值的屬性
hit-points-adjustment-title: 玩家可設定的最大生命值額外調整量(可以用公式)
hit-points-modifier-2-title: 根據HP調整2的公式所產生的數值
hit-points-modifier-title: 決定每等級生命值的屬性的修正值
immunities-title: 無視來自此類來源的傷害與效果(例如 強酸,火焰,麻痺)
include-attack-notes: 在攻擊檢定中包含註記或header圖式? 註記和header圖式會與攻擊類型匹配
include-information-title: 在豁免檢定中包含哪些額外資訊?
iterative-attacks-title: 給此武器增加額外攻擊
legs-title: 角色有多少隻腳，影響到負載能力。
link-hit-points-npc-to-pc: Updating @{NPC-HP} with sheet open updates @{HP} and vice versa
link-hit-points-title: Updating @{NPC-HP} with sheet open updates @{HP} and vice versa.
max-hp-title: 此欄位自動計算，使用職業HP、天賦職業HP、屬性加值/減值與總等級、HP調整1&2欄位、能量吸取狀態與神話冒險的生命值(如果有啟動)
maximum-damage-ability-title: 最大傷害屬性限制(例如複合弓之類)
maximum-dexterity-title: 因為防具或負重所限制在AC上的最大敏捷加值
melee-attack-notes-place: 在這輸入有關條件近戰攻擊加值的註記
metamagic-title: Click to show spell slot field to differentiate slot from spell level
morale-place: 如果有的話，在這列出在什麼情況該生物會逃離戰鬥。
mythic-bonus-hit-points-title: 從神話階層進展獲得的額外生命值: 大法師:3、鬥士:5、守護者:5、聖者:4、統帥:4、詭術大師:4
mythic-hero-power: 神話英雄資訊與神話之力
mythic-hit-points-title: Bonus HP x Tier. This is automatically added to Max HP
mythic-path-title: 神話之道: 大法師、鬥士、守護者、聖者、統帥或詭術大師
mythic-power-avail-title: 你當前可以使用的神話之力點數
mythic-power-max-title: 你的神話之力點數最大值
mythic-power-miscellaneous-title: 你從能力或專長獲得的額外神話之力點數
mythic-power-tiers-title: 你從階層獲得的神話之力點數
mythic-tier-title: 神話階層或等級，神話階層從1階到10階。
name: 名稱
nav-main-desc: Main menubar follows this element (it is not inside the menubar element). Menuitem 'all' displays all sections.
nonlethal-damage-title: 玩家可在此調整受到的非致命傷害。當角色受到的非致命傷害大於等於當前HP時會陷入恍惚，欄位外框會以黃色顯示。
npc-special-attacks-place: 在這填加所有的特殊戰鬥動作，照字母排列。不包括專長。
other-currency-title: 角色不主動攜帶的貨幣(或是放在次元袋中)
precision-damage-title: 額外或精準傷害(不加至重擊傷害中)
proficiency-title: 擅長此武器或攻擊與否
psionic-ability-title: 靈能職業的關鍵屬性修正值來源
psionic-manifester-level-and-power-point: 靈能顯能者等級與靈能點數(PP)
psionic-manifester-levels-title: 調整後的總顯能者等級
psionic-manifester-lvls-title: 具有右邊選擇的關鍵屬性的靈能職業等級總和
psionic-manifester-miscellaneous-title: 其他的顯能者等級修正值
psionic-power-points-available-title: 你當前可以使用的靈能點數
psionic-power-points-bonus-title: 你從顯能者等級與關鍵屬性修正值獲得的獎勵靈能點數
psionic-power-points-class-title: 你從職業獲得的基本靈能點數
psionic-power-points-miscellaneous-title: 你從種族、背景或專長獲得的任何額外靈能點數
psionic-power-points-reserve-title: 你的總靈能點數等於你從職業獲得的基本靈能點數、從高關鍵屬性值獲得的獎勵靈能點數與其他來源的任何額外靈能點數，例如角色種族或專長。
range-custom-place: 固定數值或隨等級成長
ranged-attack-notes-place: 在這輸入有關條件遠程攻擊加值的註記
recalculate-cmd: 重新計算角色卡的數據
recalculate-hit-points: 重新計算HP並補充至最大值
recalculate-hit-points-title: 重新計算HP與臨時HP，並把當前HP補充到最大值
resistances-title: 每當受到指定類型的傷害時，可無視此數字的傷害(例如 強酸 10)
save-notes-place: 在這輸入有關條件豁免檢定加值的註記
set-sheet-color: Set sheet color to rolltemplate color
sheet-guide: Wiki '如何使用' 角色卡指南(英文)
showsect-cmd: 點擊一下可收納或擴張
skill-notes-place: 在這輸入有關條件技能加值的註記
skill-size-title: 技能的體型修正值，潛行會加倍
skills-per-level: 職業所給予的每等級技能點
special-qualities-place: 在這填加所有的SQ，照字母排列
speed-run-title: 在你的回合，角色能一直線奔跑的最大距離
speed-title: 根據盔甲與負重調整後的速度
spell-resistance-title: 法術抗力(SR): 避免直接受到的法術與類法術能力的效果，施法者等級檢定對抗SR成功可無視
spell-targets-area-effect: 目標/ 區域/ 效果
spellbook-only-prepared-spells: 在法術書中只顯示準備的法術
spells-migrated-title: Spells migrated. If you have not deleted original spells you can remigrate. To remigrate, delete all spells on spells tab and uncheck, then press refresh.
sum-uses-from-spells: Sum of 'Uses' fields in spell rows
temporary-hit-points-buff-title: 增益所增加的臨時生命值
temporary-hit-points-miscellaneous-title: 玩家可設定的臨時生命值，並會加到總臨時HP值裡
title: 稱號/暱稱
toggle-buff: When checked, this buff is active and will count towards the totals, which will then affect the rest of the sheet. Also, only the visible/selected buffs will count towards the totals.
toggle-mythic-adventures: 顯示/啟動 神話冒險角色卡項目
toggle-psionics: 顯示/啟動 靈能角色卡項目
toggle-unchained-skills: 顯示/啟動 Unchained 技能
use-round-corners-on-simple-templates: 圓滑非簡易模版的四個角
use-simple-templates: 使用簡易模版 (法術與攻擊分別設定)
vision-title: 昏暗視覺，黑暗視覺，之類
weaknesses-title: 可能會遭受負面狀態(例如日光虛弱/恍惚)
whisper-character-rolls: PC rolls: 向GM私語或公開擲骰
whisper-character-rolls-title: 預設為PC所有的擲骰皆公開。
whisper-non-player-character-rolls: NPC rolls: 向GM私語或公開擲骰
whisper-non-player-character-rolls-title: 預設為NPC所有的擲骰皆向GM私語。
worn-equipment-hardness-title: 物品的硬度，以防止物品的HP受到傷害
worn-equipment-hp-max-title: 物品的可能最大生命值
worn-equipment-quantity-title: 如果物品有充能，這代表還剩多少
worn-equipment-slot-title: 裝備穿戴在身上的位置
worn-equipment-title: The equipment currently worn by the character
worn-equipment-value-title: 物品的價值，以金幣表示
wounded-title: 在所有的攻擊檢定、豁免檢定、技能檢定與屬性檢定上遭受-2減值，在AC與施法者等級上也是
